data.benefits: Scheme provides Concessional rate of customs duty for selected import of machinery and equipments.
data.eligibility: Eligible applicants will be any Manufacturer in automotive sector.
data.conditions: Concessional rate of customs duty will only be for selected import of machinery and equipments.
data.beneficiaries: Eligible applicants are Manufacturer in Automative sector
data.prerequisites: Eligible candidates can apply after the fulfillment of conditions
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Heavy Industries & Public Enterprises Schemes
data.context: Custom Duty Concession is a special provision that allows certain goods to be imported at a reduced rate of duty or for specific end-use purposes
data.objective: The objective of custom duty concessions is to facilitate specific scenarios related to the import of goods.
data.description: Concessional rate of customs duty for selected import of machinery and equipments.
data.how_to_apply:
The applicants will apply https://heavyindustries.gov.in/tender.
 Joint Secretary [Auto Division] Department of Heavy Industry Ministry of Heavy Industries and Public Enterprises Udyog Bhawan, New Delhi.
data.funding_facilitator: Ministry of Heavy Industries & Public Enterprises Schemes
data.funding_mechanism: Applicants will get the funds after fulfillment of conditions under the scheme.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form – To apply for the concession.
Importer Exporter Code (IEC) – Issued by DGFT.
Business Registration – Proof of business (e.g., incorporation certificate).
Customs Registration – If applicable.
Import/Export Details – Bill of Entry, Shipping Bill, invoices.
Duty Payment Receipt – Proof of paid customs duties.
Bank Account Details – For refunds or reimbursements.
Export Performance Certificate – For export-oriented units.
Self-Declaration – Eligibility confirmation.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: Room No.183, Udyog Bhawan, Rafi Marg, New Delhi- 110011
E-Mail: jsms-mhi[at]gov[dot]in
data.beneficiary: Automotive Manufacturing Industry-All Entities-All Location-All MSMEs
